title: Ep 70: LA Faves with Esmé Wang
itunes:title: Ep 70: LA Faves with Esmé Wang
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree share some of their favorite spots in Los Angeles — from beloved bookstores, hikes, spas, and restaurants, to the best places for random celebrity sightings.Then they welcome New York Times best-selling novelist and essayist,...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree share some of their favorite spots in Los Angeles — from beloved bookstores, hikes, spas, and restaurants, to the best places for random celebrity sightings.

Then they welcome New York Times best-selling novelist and essayist, Esmé Wang. She discusses being diagnosed with Schizoaffective Disorder, the stigmas and common misconceptions surrounding mental illness, how she approaches self-care, and her newest book, The Collected Schizophrenias.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in our Facebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • Molekule - For $75 off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER75 at checkout.

  • Pretty Please - For 20% off your first order, visit prettypleasecats.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Betabrand - Get 20% off the Dress Pant Yoga Pants when you visit betabrand.com/forever35.
